title: Accesso a google con impronta
content:
Buongiorno, fino a qualche mese fa, quando mi collegato da pc tramite browser Mozzilla Firefox al mio account google, mi bastava inserire il nome utente e mi arrivava la notifica sul telefono , dove inserivo l'impronta e mi collegava in automatico. Da qualche tempo ciò non avviene. Inserisco il nome utente google e mi chiede la password, se clicco su " accedi con altri metodi" metto passkey, e firefox mi chiede di inserire una chiave fisica nella usb (??) .

Cosa può esere successo? dal mio account google direi che è tutto a posto, l'accesso con impronta è abilitato.

resto in attesa grazie
creator: alessio.cad

Is this a general bug or a feature? If it is a feature, how can I turn it off? I couldn't find anything like this in the settings. Thank you in advance for your interest, take care.

title: Firefox View - searching through open tabs
content:
In the Firefox View tab, we can search for Open Tabs. I am wondering how I can make a strict search for a particular pattern. For example, let's say I have hundreds of tab open for youtube like below:

https://youtube.com/watch?v=<random> https://youtube.com/watch?v=<random> https://youtube.com/watch?v=<random> https://youtube.com <---------------------I want this one to appear in my search

how can I ONLY search for open tabs that is the youtube front page (i.e to not match anything after the ".com"). If I just search for "youtube.com", it will match all of them, but I only want the front page.

Then, i can quickly close all of the duplicate
creator: magicdog.dev

title: Recovering Passwords from logins.json.corrupt
content: Recently, I realized I haven't been logged into Firefox for the greater part of a year, and did so recently. I did so to sync my passwords with the cloud to restore in case something bad were to happen. Lo and behold, 2 days before doing this, my logins file corrupted. Attempting to open the .json in Firefox displays "unexpected character at line 1 column 1 of the JSON data". This file is pretty sizeable at 105 KB, so the info is on there, but I clearly cannot access it. I've also tried simply deleting the .corrupt extension and restarting Firefox, but it just instantly re-corrupts. Is there anyway to get my data back? Any advice is appreciated.
creator: bearhere7

title: non riesco piu ad accedere a primevideo
content:
Quando tento di caricare il sito mi compare questo messaggio:

Questa pagina non reindirizza in modo corretto

Firefox ha rilevato che il server sta reindirizzando la richiesta per questa pagina in modo che non possa mai essere completata. 

   Questo problema spesso è causato dal blocco o dal rifiuto dei cookie.

Vi ringrazio se vorrete aiutarmi a risolvere il problema. Grazie

title: all my saved passwords vanished overnight
content:
One night i accessed numerous websites using their saved passwords, but in the morning, there were no passwords in my passwords setting. I didn't knowingly change any settings. My computer is a MacBook Air w/M3 chip running Sequoia.

I tried using the instructions on the website to restore my passwords. Unfortunately, i couldn't find one or more buttons to select.

Interestingly enough, the folders at the top of the Firefox screen w/addresses to sites are still there & work. When I try to log in a selection of possible user names pops up. Please help me restore my passwords. Thanks so much!
creator: glynnebl
